basics.name: Dean Quinney
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Dean is based in the Midlands UK. His skills are in Web Development at a full stack level, from setting up servers and designing databases for backend services to frontend interfaces using an array of methodologies and technologies.

work.summary: Ventutec is a company investing in technological ideas, ranging from our hosting platform Siteopia, to Bespoke applications for the web and mobile
highlights: Architecting a range of websites and web-applications including CRM and CMS systems
Building large web-designs such as SPA(single-page applications) and mobile-specific interfaces
Supporting operations of our hosting platform from the shared-servers to VPS's(virtual private servers)
Manage and gather customer requirements for applications and websites

work.summary: Superdream are a design/creative agency creating Websites, Branding and Design for customers
highlights: Building of brouchure and news/blogging websites using the Wordpress CMS platform, or static-sites if suitable
Creation of plugins to extend functionality of existing websites
Managing hosting for our customers with a range of control panels from Plesk to cPanel
